mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan ( plan_name,plan_desc,plan_amount, cate_no, money_no, plan_startdate, plan_enddate, plan_loc ) VALUES ( #{plan_name}, #{plan_desc}, #{plan_amount}, #{cate_no}, #{money_no}, #{plan_startdate}, #{plan_enddate}, #{plan_loc} )
mapper.select: select plan_no, plan_name, plan_desc, plan_amount, plan_loc, money_no, date_format(plan_startdate, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i") plan_startdate, date_format(plan_enddate, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i") plan_enddate from plan where cate_no = #{cate_no}
